item.title: Emailvision whose the Dummy? or didn't someone test your email campaign?
item.description: Social CRM for dummies is something I've wanted to read for sometime - it could be a good e-book - if the email marketing campaign worked.

item.title: Google Wave will it change SMS Texting and Instant Messaging
item.description: Will Google Wave change SMS texting and instant messaging? Most likely - but that's about the best answer right now.
